src.client package¶

Submodules¶

src.client.client module¶

Client¶

This module contains all the code related to client side.

class src.client.client.Client(ip, port=30000, server_ip='', server_port=0, name='', is_slow=False, delay=5)¶

Bases: object

Client side of the application.

ip¶

ip address of client

Type:str
port¶

port of client

Type:int
buffer_size¶

buffer size of the client tcp connection.

Type:int
tcp_socket¶

tcp socket to talk with the server

Type:socket.socket
server_ip¶

ip address of the server

Type:str
server_port¶

port number of the server’s tcp server.

Type:int
name¶

name of the client.

Type:str
points¶

score of the client.

Type:int
is_slow¶

denotes whether the client is in slow network or not.

Type:bool
delay¶

sends or receive the data after delay amount of time if the client is in a slow network.

Type:int
root¶

main window of the client.

Type:tk.Root
up_tcp_server()¶

Starts the tcp server of the client side of the application in a different thread.

tcp_server()¶

TCP server of the client side.

do_delay()¶

Processes the data after delay amount of time if the client is in slow network.

tcp_connection()¶

TCP Connection of the client side.

send_and_receive_data()¶

Sends data to server and received the response from the server.

make_form()¶

Makes a blank form for the user to input the server address.

draw_blank_canvas()¶

Draws a blank canvas where the points will be in future to be clicked.

blank_my_points()¶

Draws a blank canvas where the points of a client will be shown.

clear_canvas()¶

Clear a canvas object

write_on_canvas()¶

Writes text on the (x,y) position of the canvas

join_click_handler()¶

This method is ran after the join button is clicked.

draw_squares()¶

Draws squares on the main canvas of the board.

show()¶

Shows the screen.

update_point_canvas()¶

Updates point-canvas and shows the score to client.

square_click_handler()¶

This method is invoked when user clicks on a square.

on_game_end()¶

This method is invoked when there is no more squares on the screen.

handle_connections()¶

This method is invoked on square is clicked.

square_clicked()¶

This square is clicked when the square is clicked.

show_status()¶

After the game over, server’s data broadcast is handled by this method.

show_final_status()¶

Shows the final ranks of all of the players after the game is over.

close()¶

This method is invoked just before the client closes the window.

blank_my_points()

Draws a blank canvas where the points of a client will be shown.

clear_canvas(canvas)

Clear a canvas object

Parameters:canvas (tkinter.Canvas) – An canvas object
close()

This method is invoked just before the client closes the window.

do_delay(data)

Processes the data after delay amount of time if the client is in slow network.

Parameters:data (dictionary) – The data dictionary sent from the server.
draw_blank_canvas()

Draws a blank canvas where the points will be in future to be clicked.

draw_squares()

Draws squares on the main canvas of the board.

handle_connections(square_id, clicked_at, amount=5)

This method is invoked on square is clicked.

Parameters:
  • square_id (int) – id of the square
  • clicked_at (datetime.datetime) – the time when square is clicked.
  • amount (int, optional) – Score to increase. Defaults to 5.
join_click_handler(event)

This method is ran after the join button is clicked.

Parameters:event (tkinter.Event) – Button click event
make_form()

Makes a blank form for the user to input the server address.

on_game_end()

This method is invoked when there is no more squares on the screen.

send_and_receive_data(data)

Sends data to server and received the response from the server.

Parameters:data (dictionary) – Data dictionary which has to be sent.
Returns:Response dictionary from server.
Return type:dictionary
show()

Shows the screen.

show_final_status(final_ranks)

Shows the final ranks of all of the players after the game is over.

Parameters:final_ranks (list) – List of the players along with their rank and ids.
show_status()

After the game over, server’s data broadcast is handled by this method.

square_click_handler(event)

This method is invoked when user clicks on a square.

Parameters:event (tkinter.Event) – click event
square_clicked(square_id, clicked_at, amount=5)

This square is clicked when the square is clicked.

Parameters:
  • square_id (int) – id of the square
  • clicked_at (datetime.datetime) – time when square is clicked by the user.
  • amount (int, optional) – Score obtained by clicking on a square. Defaults to 5.
tcp_connection(connection_socket, addr)

TCP Connection of the client side.

Parameters:
  • connection_socket (socket.socket) – connection socket of the client through which client will talk with the server
  • addr (tuple) – IP and Port tuple of the sender.
tcp_server()

TCP server of the client side.

up_tcp_server()

Starts the tcp server of the client side of the application in a different thread.

update_point_canvas(new_point)

Updates point-canvas and shows the score to client.

Parameters:new_point (int) – user’s score
write_on_canvas(canvas, text, x, y)

Writes text on the (x,y) position of the canvas

Parameters:
  • canvas (tkinter.Canvas) – An canvas object
  • text (str) – The string to be written on the canvas
  • x (int) – x coordinate of the text
  • y (int) – y coordinate of the text
